channel.title: Way people die
channel.description: When people die , in my server they have no emote they just tele to the spawn , how do i create the die emote when someone dies?. I got project insanity , Pking server

item.title: Way people die
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Speaking of this.
-steals thread-

I want to change my animation.
I want it to show my character dieing then I want to make it do another animation right after that. How would I?

-gives thread back-

Go to client.java and look for something like this:
if(isDead && respawnTimer == -6)

The animation code you want is: 836

Read full topic

item.title: Way people die
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

Its a void. Search for “public void applyDead()” (in playerassistant)
then under there it is simple.

Read full topic
